Text.val: 03.07.2009 SH SCR14463 Replaced old message box program with GB007 (GB0011)
03.05.2006 LB Remove Upper Function From RPG Call
This program is an interface to MSE/MGCHGPWDCL and MSE/MGCHGPWD programs
that come to change password of the current user based on QSYCHGPW system API
only if password has been changed and if this functionality is enabled
by setting HUSR_DATE_PWDEXPIRES<>NULL, we write back the

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Change User Password')
GetParam ('B_EXIT')
MlsTrans ('Change')
INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]SYSAS400')
Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]MAGICLIB'))&'/MGRTVJOBA'
NOT (ISNULL ({0,10}))
MlsTrans ('New password and verify password not the same.')
INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]SYSAS400')
Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]MAGICLIB'))&'/MGCHGPWDCL'
MlsTrans ('CPD2201 System user profile cannot be changed.')
MlsTrans (' CPD2356 New password cannot be same as current password.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22C0 Password does not meet password rules. Return code:')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22C2 Minimum password length is exceeded. Minimum length is:')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22C3 Maximum password length is exceeded. Maximum length is:')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22C4 Password matches one of 32 previous passwords.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22C5 Password contains one of the following:')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22C6 Password contains two numbers next to each other.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22C7 Password contains a character used more than once.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22C8 Same character in same position as previous password.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22C9 Password must contain a number.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22D0 Password contains a character repeated consecutively.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22D1 Password cannot be same as user ID.')
MlsTrans ('CPF22E2 Password not correct for user profile')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22E3 Current User profile is disabled. ')
MlsTrans ('CPF22F5 A value for new password not allowed at current system password level. Invalid value:')&' '&Trim ({1,8})&'.'
MlsTrans ('CPF22F6 New password cannot be *NONE.')
{1,7}&' '&MlsTrans (' Password cannot be changed, please contact Security Administrator')
InStr ('CPD2201CPD2356CPF22C0CPF22C2CPF22C3CPF22C4CPF22C5CPF22C6CPF22C7CPF22C8CPF22C9CPF22D0CPF22D1CPF22E2CPF22E3CPF22F5CPF22F6',{1,7})>0

Text.val: add one month to password expiration and update date of last change to today

ExpSyntax.val: AddDate (Date (),0,0,60)
Date ()
